@metadata.comment: Don't know how often I'll update this top part lol

descriptions.CREATE_INSTANT_INVITE: Allows the user to create invites for the guild
descriptions.KICK_MEMBERS: Allows the user to kick members from the guild
descriptions.BAN_MEMBERS: Allows the user to ban members from the guild
descriptions.ADMINISTRATOR: Allows all permissions and bypasses channel permission overwrites. This is a dangerous permission!
descriptions.MANAGE_CHANNELS: Allows the user to manage and edit channels
descriptions.MANAGE_GUILD: Allows management and editing of the guild
descriptions.ADD_REACTIONS: Allows user to add reactions to messages
descriptions.VIEW_AUDIT_LOG: Allows the user to view the audit log
descriptions.PRIORITY_SPEAKER: Allows for using priority speaker in a voice channel
descriptions.VIEW_CHANNEL: Allows the user to view the channel
descriptions.SEND_TTS_MESSAGES: Allows the user to send text-to-speech messages
descriptions.MANAGE_MESSAGES: Allows the user to delete messages that aren't their own
descriptions.EMBED_LINKS: Allow links sent by this user to auto-embed
descriptions.ATTACH_FILES: Allows the user to attach files
descriptions.READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY: Allows user to read the message history
descriptions.MENTION_EVERYONE: Allows the user to mention everyone
descriptions.USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS: Allows the user to use external emojis
descriptions.VIEW_GUILD_INSIGHTS: Allows the user to see guild insights
descriptions.CONNECT: Allows the user to connect to a voice channel
descriptions.SPEAK: Allows the user to speak in a voice channel
descriptions.MUTE_MEMBERS: Allows user to mute other members
descriptions.DEAFEN_MEMBERS: Allows user to deafen other members
descriptions.MOVE_MEMBERS: Allows the user to move members between voice channels
descriptions.USE_VAD: Allows users to speak in a voice channel by simply talking
descriptions.CHANGE_NICKNAME: Allows the user to change their own nickname
descriptions.MANAGE_NICKNAMES: Allows user to change nicknames of other members
descriptions.MANAGE_ROLES: Allows user to edit and manage roles
descriptions.MANAGE_WEBHOOKS: Allows management and editing of webhooks
descriptions.MANAGE_GUILD_EXPRESSIONS: Allows for managing emoji, stickers, and soundboards
descriptions.USE_APPLICATION_COMMANDS: Allows the user to use application commands
descriptions.REQUEST_TO_SPEAK: Allows user to request to speak in stage channel
descriptions.MANAGE_EVENTS: Allows user to edit and manage events
descriptions.MANAGE_THREADS: Allows the user to delete and archive threads and view all private threads
descriptions.CREATE_PUBLIC_THREADS: Allows the user to create public threads
descriptions.CREATE_PRIVATE_THREADS: Allows the user to create private threads
descriptions.USE_EXTERNAL_STICKERS: Allows user to use external stickers
descriptions.SEND_MESSAGES_IN_THREADS: Allows the user to send messages in threads
descriptions.USE_EMBEDDED_ACTIVITIES: Allows the user to use embedded activities
descriptions.MODERATE_MEMBERS: Allows the user to time out other users to prevent them from sending or reacting to messages in chat and threads, and from speaking in voice and stage channels
descriptions.VIEW_CREATOR_MONETIZATION_ANALYTICS: Allows for viewing role subscription insights
descriptions.USE_SOUNDBOARD: Allows for using soundboard in a voice channel
descriptions.CREATE_GUILD_EXPRESSIONS: Allows for creating emojis, stickers, and soundboard sounds, and editing and deleting those created by the current user.
descriptions.CREATE_EVENTS: Allows for creating scheduled events, and editing and deleting those created by the current user.
descriptions.USE_EXTERNAL_SOUNDS: Allows the usage of custom soundboard sounds from other servers
descriptions.USE_EXTERNAL_APPS: Allows user-installed apps to send public responses. When disabled, users will still be allowed to use their apps but the responses will be ephemeral. This only applies to apps not also installed to the server.
